_sText:
This is the map about the game S.T.A.L.K.E.R with textures and models from this game...Hope you will enjoy the game)
Was tested on IbizaGaming.Ru Zombie Mod 62.152.35.163:27025

Changes from b4 to b5:

- Fixed the bag with the Lab Door 1, now you can push the button only once.

- Fixed the bag with the lift. You can't control him with w and s buttons.

- become more clear in the room where you turn on the electricity. 

- Delay before Lab Door 2 will open for zombies are 20 seconds.

- The speed of the second lift are 33 inches/second.

- The weight of map decreased by 6 mb.

- Some textures are in other place

In b5_1 version zombies have more chances to win at all stages of the map.
